PRF_FallenDown.rockstarDescription1: decides whether to ik rotate body to match ground angle

PRF_DontRenderThisFrame.rockstarDescription1: force ped to stop rendering this frame (for example - drive task can stop peds rendering inside buses)

PRF_BlockMovementAnims.rockstarDescription1: completely disable processing of on-foot movement anim blending for this frame

PRF_ZeroDesiredMoveBlendRatios.rockstarDescription1: zero out all inputs to movement system this frame, causing ped to stop moving

PRF_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing.rockstarDescription1: If this is set, then CTaskSimpleMoveDoNothing will not reset desired moveblendratio to zero this frame.

PRF_FollowingRoute.rockstarDescription1: whether this ped is following a route of some sort - used to let simplest goto task pull the ped back onto their current route segment

PRF_TakingRouteSplineCorner.rockstarDescription1: whether the ped is cornering via a spline curve, which will take them off their route linesegment

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasks.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call process physics for (main) tasks this frame

PRF_ProcessPreRender2.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call ProcessPreRender2 for tasks

PRF_FiringWeapon.rockstarDescription1: set when ped fires any weapon, so script can check the flag

PRF_SearchingForCover.rockstarDescription1: Set if the ped is likely to be searching for cover, used by the navmesh to load coverpoints around interested peds

PRF_KeepCoverPoint.rockstarDescription1: Set if the ped wants to keep their current cover point this frame, otherwise it gets released

PRF_IsClimbing.rockstarDescription1: If the ped is climbing, shimmying or on a ladder.  Stops ProcessProbes() from happening.

PRF_IsLanding.rockstarDescription1: is landing after being in the air

PRF_CullExtraFarAway.rockstarDescription1: flag Ai can set to make ped get culled further away (used for roadblock cops, crimials...)

PRF_DoNotClampFootIk.rockstarDescription1: Stop clamping the foot IK. Maybe the clamps should be parameters of the IK manager, but apparently that is to be refactored in future

PRF_PatrollingInVehicle.rockstarDescription1: ped is patrolling in a vehicle, likely meaning they are swat or police

PRF_IsWalkingRoundPlayer.rockstarDescription1: Whether this ped is walking around another ped (one frame latency)

PRF_AmbientAnimsBlocked.rockstarDescription1: Blocks new ambient idles from starting.

PRF_ApplyVelocityDirectly.rockstarDescription1: Should we apply the velocity directly to the physics collider or go through the force solver?

PRF_ResetMoveGroupAfterRagdoll.rockstarDescription1: If true, will reset the temp anim group when not ragdolling

PRF_DisablePedConstraints.rockstarDescription1: Allow the ped to rotate around freely

PRF_DisablePlayerJumping.rockstarDescription1: Disables player jumping if true. Reset in ResetPostPhysics, as it will be set via script

PRF_DisableAsleepImpulse.rockstarDescription1: Disable the code that pushes peds which fall asleep in the air

PRF_PlacingCharge.rockstarDescription1: Setting Bomb (firing weapon is set also)

PRF_ScriptDisableSecondaryAnimationTasks.rockstarDescription1: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims

PRF_InfiniteStamina.rockstarDescription1: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina

PRF_BlockWeaponReactionsUnlessDead.rockstarDescription1: Stops ragdoll and nm behaviors triggering from weapon damage unless the ped has died.

PRF_InCoverFacingLeft.rockstarDescription1: set when exiting the cover state saying if we are facing left

PRF_ForcePeekFromCover.rockstarDescription1: if set the ped will go into peeking if they are already in cover

PRF_NotAllowedToChangeCrouchState.rockstarDescription1: if set the ped will not be allowed to change their crouch state

PRF_ForceMeleeStrafingAnims.rockstarDescription1: forces a ped to use the melee strafing anims when strafing

PRF_HitPedWithWeapon.rockstarDescription1: set when damage is inflicted by this ped on another ped

PRF_ForcePedToUseScripCamHeading.rockstarDescription1: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay

PRF_ProcessProbesWhenExtractingZ.rockstarDescription1: makes the capsule physics push the ped out of the ground even when extracting z

PRF_KeepDesiredCoverPoint.rockstarDescription1: should the ped keep their desired cover point this frame

PRF_HasProcessedCornering.rockstarDescription1: whether the ped has already processed slowing down for this corner

PRF_StandingOnForkliftForks.rockstarDescription1: Set when the ped standing capsule hits the forklift forks.

PRF_AimWeaponReactionRunning.rockstarDescription1: ped is running the reaction task this frame

PRF_InContactWithFoliage.rockstarDescription1: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds

PRF_ForceExplosionCollisions.rockstarDescription1: ped will always collide with explosions, even when collision is off

PRF_IgnoreTargetsCoverForLOS.rockstarDescription1: when checking LOS against targets this ped will ignore their cover (if the cover exists)

PRF_BlockAnimatedWeaponReactions.rockstarDescription1: Ped should not play animated damager reactions while this flag is set

PRF_DisablePedCapsule.rockstarDescription1: Removes the ped capsule from the physics simulation

PRF_DisableCrouchWhileInCover.rockstarDescription1: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.

PRF_IncreasedAvoidanceRadius.rockstarDescription1: Adds extra 2m onto the radius other peds use to avoid this ped during local steering.

PRF_ForceRunningSpeedForFragSmashing.rockstarDescription1: Can be set by designers to force the ped to smash more easily through frags.

PRF_EnableMoverAnimationWhileAttached.rockstarDescription1: While flagged, any mover animation will be applied to the offset of the attachment.

PRF_NoTimeDelayBeforeShot.rockstarDescription1: While flagged, The time delay before a player can fire after aiming is 0

PRF_SearchingForAutoVaultClimb.rockstarDescription1: inform climb code we are doing an autovault

PRF_ExtraLongWeaponRange.rockstarDescription1: Extends the range of a peds weapons to 250m

PRF_ForcePlayerToEnterVehicleThroughDire.rockstarDescription1: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles

PRF_TaskCullExtraFarAway.rockstarDescription1: Can be set by ai tasks on the main task tree to disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle.

PRF_IsVaulting.rockstarDescription1: Set the entire time CTaskVault is running.

PRF_IsParachuting.rockstarDescription1: Set the entire time CTaskParachute is running.

PRF_SuppressSlowingForCorners.rockstarDescription1: If set this will prevent the ped from slowing down to take corners this frame

PRF_JayWalking.rockstarDescription1: If set then the ped is jay walking and a vehicle is allowed to run him over.

PRF_UseBulletPenetration.rockstarDescription1: Ped will use bullet penetration code.

PRF_ForceAimAtHead.rockstarDescription1: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped

PRF_IsInStationaryScenario.rockstarDescription1: In a scenario and not moving

PRF_AllowPullingPedOntoRoute.rockstarDescription1: allows goto task to apply heading in order to pull a ped back onto their route

PRF_ApplyAnimatedVelocityWhilstAttached.rockstarDescription1: Allows attachment offsets to be updated from animated velocities

PRF_ResponseAfterScenarioPanic.rockstarDescription1: The ped is entering threat response after panic exiting a scenario.

PRF_IsNearDoor.rockstarDescription1: Ped is near a non-vehicle door

PRF_DisableDynamicCapsuleRadius.rockstarDescription1: Turn off dynamic adjustments to ped capsules

PRF_IsRappelling.rockstarDescription1: Is currently in a rappel task

PRF_SkipReactInReactAndFlee.rockstarDescription1: When this ped goes to ThreatResponse, play the flee transition but not the reaction clip if fleeing.

PRF_CannotBeTargeted.rockstarDescription1: Will prevent this ped from being a part of any other peds target list

PRF_IsFalling.rockstarDescription1: Ped is in pure fall state (i.e. no parachuting, landing etc included

PRF_ForceInjuryAfterStunned.rockstarDescription1: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned

PRF_HurtThisFrame.rockstarDescription1: The ped has entered the hurt state this frame

PRF_BlockWeaponFire.rockstarDescription1: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon

PRF_ExpandPedCapsuleFromSkeleton.rockstarDescription1: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton

PRF_DisableWeaponLaserSight.rockstarDescription1: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame

PRF_PedExitedVehicleThisFrame.rockstarDescription1: Set when ped gets set out of vehicle

PRF_SearchingForDropDown.rockstarDescription1: Ped is seatching for drop down

PRF_UseTighterTurnSettings.rockstarDescription1: Ped should use tighter turn settings in human locomotion motion task

PRF_DisableArmSolver.rockstarDescription1: Disable the arm solver this frame

PRF_TasksNeedProcessMoveSignalCalls.rockstarDescription1: Set when peds require calls to ProcessMoveSignals(), for AI timeslicing to work with Move

PRF_NoCollisionMovementMode.rockstarDescription1: Set when a ped is moving in an area where collisions with fixed geometry are unlikely.  The ped's physics will not be forced to activate.

PRF_IsNearLaddder.rockstarDescription1: Ped is near top of a ladder

PRF_IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors.rockstarDescription1: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

PRF_BlockIkWeaponReactions.rockstarDescription1: Ped should not play Ik damager reactions while this flag is set

PRF_FirstPhysicsUpdate.rockstarDescription1: Ped was just created this frame

PRF_SuspendInitiatedMeleeActions.rockstarDescription1: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely

PRF_SuppressInAirEvent.rockstarDescription1: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame

PRF_AllowTasksIncompatibleWithMotion.rockstarDescription1: If set, ped will skip CheckTasksAreCompatibleWithMotion

PRF_HasGunTaskWithAimingState.rockstarDescription1: Ped is running TASK_GUN and task's state is State_Aim

PRF_SuppressLethalMeleeActions.rockstarDescription1: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)

PRF_AmbientIdleAndBaseAnimsBlocked.rockstarDescription1: Blocks ambient idles and base animations from playing.

PRF_UseAlternativeWhenBlock.rockstarDescription1: If set, ped will use alternative aiming/firing anims

PRF_ForceLowLodWaterCheck.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped will always force probe for being in water when in low LOD mode.

PRF_MakeHeadInvisible.rockstarDescription1: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001

PRF_NoAutoRunWhenFiring.rockstarDescription1: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set.

PRF_PermitEventDuringScenarioExit.rockstarDescription1: Ignore certain aspects (FOV checks, etc) of AffectsPedCore() on some events while the ped is playing a scenario exit.

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundVehicles.rockstarDescription1: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundPeds.rockstarDescription1: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundObjects.rockstarDescription1: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around objects

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundNavMeshEdges.rockstarDescription1: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around nav mesh edges

PRF_ForceCombatTaunt.rockstarDescription1: Forces a combat taunt for peds using the insult special ability.

PRF_SkipAiUpdateProcessControl.rockstarDescription1: True if we've already run this ped's AI and can skip it from within ProcessControl

PRF_OverridePhysics.rockstarDescription1: A reset flag that disables collision and gravity on the ped and drives entity positions and rotations directly, rather than going through the physics update.

PRF_WasPhysicsOverridden.rockstarDescription1: True if physics was overriden during the last update.

PRF_BlockWeaponHoldingAnims.rockstarDescription1: Block any onfoot weapon holding anims.

PRF_DisableMoveTaskHeadingAdjustments.rockstarDescription1: True if the ped's movement task should not adjust the heading of the ped.

PRF_PreventAllMeleeTakedowns.rockstarDescription1: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped

PRF_PreventFailedMeleeTakedowns.rockstarDescription1: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedowns from being performed on this ped

PRF_UseTighterAvoidanceSettings.rockstarDescription1: Ped should use tighter avoidance settings in navigation task

PRF_IsHigherPriorityClipControllingPed.rockstarDescription1: True if the active task on the main task tree is taking responsibility for the mover track

PRF_VehicleCrushingRagdoll.rockstarDescription1: Set to true if a vehicle is pressing downward on the ragdoll

PRF_OnActivationUpdate.rockstarDescription1: Ped was just activated this frame

PRF_ForceMotionStateLeaveDesiredMBR.rockstarDescription1: Set this to disable setting the desired move blendratio when forcing the motion state. Usefull for forcing a flee start, etc

PRF_DisableDropDowns.rockstarDescription1: Disable drop downs for this ped

PRF_InContactWithBIGFoliage.rockstarDescription1: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds that are large and the player can be hidden

PRF_DisableCellphoneAnimations.rockstarDescription1: tells taskmobile phone to Blends out move network and prevents it from blending in

PRF_TouchingOverhang.rockstarDescription1: Some part appears to be contrained downwards

PRF_TooSteepForPlayer.rockstarDescription1: We're standing on something flagged too steep for the player to stand on

PRF_BlockSecondaryAnim.rockstarDescription1: Block any secondary scripted task animations playing on this ped

PRF_IsInCombat.rockstarDescription1: This ped is running the combat task

PRF_UseHeadOrientationForPerception.rockstarDescription1: Will use the ped's head orientation for perception tests

PRF_IsDoingDriveby.rockstarDescription1: This ped is running a driveby gun or projectile task

PRF_IsEnteringCover.rockstarDescription1: This ped is running a cover entry task

PRF_ForceMovementScannerCheck.rockstarDescription1: Set to make CStaticMovementScanner::Scan() check for collisions as if we were moving

PRF_DisableJumpRagdollOnCollision.rockstarDescription1: If true, the player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping

PRF_IsBeingMeleeHomedByPlayer.rockstarDescription1: Set on the target ped in melee if the player is homing towards them

PRF_ShouldLaunchBicycleThisFrame.rockstarDescription1: This ped should launch the bicycle this frame

PRF_CanDoBicycleWheelie.rockstarDescription1: This ped can do a bicycle wheelie

PRF_ForceProcessPhysicsUpdateEachSimStep.rockstarDescription1: If true, ProcessPhysics() will execute completely for each physics simulation step

PRF_DisablePedCapsuleMapCollision.rockstarDescription1: Disables collision between the ped capsule and the map (usefull in cases where the entity position is being tightly controlled outside of physics, e.g. by an animation)

PRF_DisableSeatShuffleDueToInjuredDriver.rockstarDescription1: If true, motion in vehicle task won't shuffle to the driver seat just because the driver is injured

PRF_ProcessPostMovement.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call ProcessPostMovement for tasks

PRF_ProcessPostCamera.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call ProcessPostCamera for tasks

PRF_ProcessPostPreRender.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call ProcessPostPreRender for tasks

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksMotion.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call process physics for motion tasks this frame

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksMovement.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call process physics for movement tasks this frame

PRF_DisableFriendlyGunReactAudio.rockstarDescription1: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.

PRF_ForceForwardTransitionInReactAndFlee.rockstarDescription1: If set, force CTaskReactAndFlee to use a forward facing flee transition

PRF_DoNotSkipNavMeshTrackerUpdate.rockstarDescription1: If set we will not allow the NavMeshTracker update to be skipped this frame.

PRF_RagdollOnVehicle.rockstarDescription1: Set to true when the ragdoll is lying on top of a vehicle (note- hands, feet, forearms and shins are not included in the test)

PRF_DisableNMForRiverRapids.rockstarDescription1: If set, disable NM reactions to fast moving water

PRF_IsInWrithe.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped is on the ground writhing and might start shooting from ground

PRF_PreventGoingIntoStillInVehicleState.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose

PRF_UseFastEnterExitVehicleRates.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster

PRF_DisableGroundAttachment.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped won't attach to a ground physical when his physics disables (useful for cutscenes, etc)

PRF_ForceProcessPedStandingUpdateEachSim.rockstarDescription1: When set, ProcessPedStanding will get called for each physics step.

PRF_DisableFlashLight.rockstarDescription1: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off.

PRF_DoingCombatRoll.rockstarDescription1: When set, the ped is doing a combat roll

PRF_CanAbortExitForInAirEvent.rockstarDescription1: When set, the ped can abort the exit vehicle anim to go into fall

PRF_ForceEnableFlashLightForAI.rockstarDescription1: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light

PRF_WaitingForCompletedPathRequest.rockstarDescription1: This ped is waiting for a path request which is now complete, so their tasks must be updated this frame

PRF_EnableSteepSlopePrevention.rockstarDescription1: Pushes the ped through the same steep slope tolerances in TaskMotionBase that the player encounters

PRF_ProcessPostMovementTimeSliced.rockstarDescription1: Parallel flag to ProcessPostMovement, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

PRF_OverrideHairScale.rockstarDescription1: Scales the ped's hair down to the specified value

PRF_ConsiderAsPlayerCoverThreatWithoutLO.rockstarDescription1: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player

PRF_StreamActionModeAnimsIfDisabled.rockstarDescription1: Stream action mode anims even if action mode is disabled

PRF_ForceUpdateRagdollMatrix.rockstarDescription1: Ped requires ragdoll matrix update next frame.

PRF_PreventGoingIntoShuntInVehicleState.rockstarDescription1: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpa.rockstarDescription1: Block ragdoll activations from animated player bumps

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpa.rockstarDescription1: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with an ai ragdoll

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdoll.rockstarDescription1: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with a player ragdoll

PRF_DisableVisemeBodyAdditive.rockstarDescription1: If set, prevents visemes from playing any additive body animations

PRF_CapsuleBeingPushedByPlayerCapsule.rockstarDescription1: Set when the player capsule is pushing up against this peds capsule

PRF_UsingMoverExtraction.rockstarDescription1: Set when the players capsule is getting repositioned each frame relative to an anim and origin

PRF_EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.rockstarDescription1: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement

PRF_UseTighterEnterVehicleSettings.rockstarDescription1: Ped should use tighter (shorter) settings for entering vehicles

PRF_InRaceMode.rockstarDescription1: Set when the player is in the race mode.

PRF_AllowSpecialAbilityInVehicle.rockstarDescription1: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle

PRF_DisableInVehicleActions.rockstarDescription1: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions such as starting engine, hotwiring, closing door etc.

PRF_ForceInstantSteeringWheelIkBlendIn.rockstarDescription1: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time.

PRF_IgnoreThreatEngagePlayerCoverBonus.rockstarDescription1: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at

PRF_Block180Turns.rockstarDescription1: Blocks triggering of 180 turns in human locomotion this frame.

PRF_DontCloseVehicleDoor.rockstarDescription1: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're in

PRF_SkipExplosionOcclusion.rockstarDescription1: Map collision will not block this ped from being hit by explosions

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksTimeSliced.rockstarDescription1: Parallel flag to ProcessPhysicsTasks, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

PRF_MeleeStrikeAgainstNonPed.rockstarDescription1: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material

PRF_IgnoreNavigationForDoorArmIK.rockstarDescription1: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK

PRF_DisablePedCollisionWithPedEvent.rockstarDescription1: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped

PRF_IgnoreVelocityWhenClosingVehicleDoor.rockstarDescription1: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway

PRF_DontWalkRoundObjects.rockstarDescription1: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving

PRF_CancelLeftHandGripIk.rockstarDescription1: Call ProcessLeftHandGripIk() to cancel left hand grip IK, at the right time of the frame

PRF_ResetMovementStaticCounter.rockstarDescription1: Will keep reset the static counter when this is set

PRF_DisableInVehiclePedVariationBlocking.rockstarDescription1: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise

PRF_ReduceEffectOfVehicleRamControlLoss.rockstarDescription1: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped

PRF_DisablePlayerMeleeFriendlyAttacks.rockstarDescription1: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.

PRF_IsMeleeTargetUnreachable.rockstarDescription1: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)

PRF_OverrideHairScaleLarger.rockstarDescription1: Scales the ped's hair up to the specified value

PRF_DisableMeleeHitReactions.rockstarDescription1: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction

PRF_VisemeAnimsAudioBlocked.rockstarDescription1: Blocks viseme anims audio from playing

PRF_AllowHeadPropInVehicle.rockstarDescription1: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle

PRF_SetLastBoundMatricesDone.rockstarDescription1: Ensure that the last bound matrices are only updated once per frame

PRF_PreserveAnimatedAngularVelocity.rockstarDescription1: Don't allow the locomotion task to adjust angular velocity coming from animation

PRF_OpenDoorArmIK.rockstarDescription1: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK

PRF_UseTighterTurnSettingsForScript.rockstarDescription1: Script set flag, to force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task

PRF_ForcePreCameraProcessExternallyDrive.rockstarDescription1: Set if the ped should process externally driven dofs before the pre-camera ai update

PRF_LadderBlockingMovement.rockstarDescription1: Ped is waiting for ladder and blocking movement to prevent falling off

PRF_DisableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.rockstarDescription1: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)

PRF_SteerIntoSkids.rockstarDescription1: If set, steer into skids while driving

PRF_AllowOpenDoorIkBeforeFullMovement.rockstarDescription1: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving

PRF_AllowHomingMissileLockOnInVehicle.rockstarDescription1: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle

PRF_DontChangeHorseMbr.rockstarDescription1: Similar to PRF_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing, but for horses.

PRF_DisableMaterialCollisionDamage.rockstarDescription1: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)

PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLockon.rockstarDescription1: Don't target friendly players in MP

PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLethalMeleeActions.rockstarDescription1: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP

PRF_IfLeaderStopsSeekCover.rockstarDescription1: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can

PRF_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments.rockstarDescription1: do we need to call PRF_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments for tasks

PRF_IsUsingJetpack.rockstarDescription1: Is ped currently using jetpack. e.g. in air

PRF_IsClosingVehicleDoor.rockstarDescription1: Ped is closing a vehicle door

PRF_DisableIdleExtraHeadingChange.rockstarDescription1: Disable lerping the ped towards the desired heading in the locomotion idle

PRF_OnlySelectVehicleWeapons.rockstarDescription1: Only allows vehicle weapons to be selected in CPedWeaponSelector::SelectWeapon

PRF_IsWarpingIntoVehicleMP.rockstarDescription1: Set in CTaskEnterVehicle::SetPedInSeat_OnEnter if ped is warping into a vehicle in multiplayer

PRF_RemoveHelmet.rockstarDescription1: Forces a ped to remove its helmet.

PRF_IsRemovingHelmet.rockstarDescription1: Returns true if ped is removing its helmet.

PRF_NeverRagdoll.rockstarDescription1: Disable all attempts by this ped to ragdoll.

PRF_DisableWallHitAnimation.rockstarDescription1: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame.

PRF_PlayAgitatedAnimsInVehicle.rockstarDescription1: Play agitated anims in vehicle - overrides normal sit idle

PRF_IsSeatShuffling.rockstarDescription1: Returns true if ped is shuffling seat.

PRF_IsThrowingProjectileWhileAiming.rockstarDescription1: True if we are running TASK_AIM_AND_THROW_PROJECTILE as a subtask of TASK_AIM_GUN_ON_FOOT.

PRF_AllowControlRadioInAnySeatInMP.rockstarDescription1: Allows ped in any seat to control radio in multiplayer.

PRF_DisableSpycarTransformation.rockstarDescription1: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes.

PRF_BlockQuadLocomotionIdleTurns.rockstarDescription1: Prevent CTaskQuadLocomotion from blending in idle turns, regardless of desired/currenting heading differential.

PRF_BlockHeadbobbingToRadio.rockstarDescription1: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles.

PRF_PlayFPSIdleFidgets.rockstarDescription1: Allows us to load and play idle fidgets in TaskMotionAiming

PRF_ForceExtraLongBlendInForPedSkipIdleC.rockstarDescription1: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop

PRF_BlendingOutFPSIdleFidgets.rockstarDescription1: True if FPS idle fidgets are blending out

PRF_FPSSwimUseSwimMotionTask.rockstarDescription1: Set to true when we are pressing forward on the left stick in FPS mode so we switch from Aiming to Swimmimg/Diving motion tasks

PRF_FPSSwimUseAimingMotionTask.rockstarDescription1: Set to true when we are strafing in water in FPS mode so we use the motion aiming task

PRF_FiringWeaponWhenReady.rockstarDescription1: set when ped has decided to fire weapon when ready, used in FPS mode

PRF_IsBlindFiring.rockstarDescription1: True if the blind fire task is running

PRF_IsPeekingFromCover.rockstarDescription1: True if the ped is peeking in cover

PRF_TaskSkipProcessPreComputeImpacts.rockstarDescription1: True to bail out of ProcessPreComputeImpacts

PRF_DisableAssistedAimLockon.rockstarDescription1: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim

PRF_FPSAllowAimIKForThrownProjectile.rockstarDescription1: To control enabling of FPS aim IK while using a projectile until it is ready

PRF_ForcePreCameraAiAnimUpdateIfFirstPer.rockstarDescription1: Force a pre camera ai and animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

PRF_NeverDieFromCapsuleRagdollSettings.rockstarDescription1: Negate the capsule's preference for ragdoll triggering death on this ped.

PRF_InContactWithDeepSurface.rockstarDescription1: ped is in contact with GTA_DEEP_SURFACE_TYPE bounds

PRF_IncludePedReferenceVelocityWhenFirin.rockstarDescription1: Add on the ped's velocity to the projectile's initial velocity.

PRF_ForcePreCameraAnimUpdate.rockstarDescription1: Force a pre camera animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

PRF_DisableHelmetCullFPS.rockstarDescription1: Disables PV_FLAG_HIDE_IN_FIRST_PERSON from culling the prop in CPedPropsMgr::RenderPropsInternal

PRF_DisableFPSArmIK.rockstarDescription1: Disables FPS arm IK in CTaskPlayerOnFoot::IsStateValidForFPSIK

PRF_DisableRightArmIKInCoverOutroFPS.rockstarDescription1: Turn off right arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

PRF_WeaponBlockedInFPSMode.rockstarDescription1: True if running CTaskWeaponBlocked in FPS mode

PRF_WasFPSJumpingWithProjectile.rockstarDescription1: ped was jumping on foot with projectile in hand

PRF_WaypointPlaybackSlowMoreForCorners.rockstarDescription1: slow for corners more aggressively for waypoint playback

PRF_UseBulletPenetrationForGlass.rockstarDescription1: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.

PRF_CanBePinnedByFriendlyBullets.rockstarDescription1: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds

PRF_DisableLeftArmIKInCoverOutroFPS.rockstarDescription1: Turn off left arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

PRF_DisableSpikeStripRoadBlocks.rockstarDescription1: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning

PRF_PutDownHelmetFX.rockstarDescription1: trigger the put down helmet fx

PRF_IsLowerPriorityMeleeTarget.rockstarDescription1: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button

PRF_StartProjectileTaskWithPrimingDisabl.rockstarDescription1: Set this flag to disable priming when the projectile task starts up until the attack trigger is released and pressed again

PRF_CheckFPSSwitchInCameraUpdate.rockstarDescription1: Set if we want to perform a second AI/anim update when switching between first person/third person

PRF_ForceAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft.rockstarDescription1: Force ped to auto-equip a helmet om entering aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft (set in the interaction menu)

PRF_BlockRemotePlayerRecording.rockstarDescription1: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).

PRF_UseFirstPersonVehicleAnimsIfFPSCamNo.rockstarDescription1: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

PRF_ForceIntoStandPoseOnJetski.rockstarDescription1: puts the ped in a standing pose on the jetski

PRF_InAirDefenceSphere.rockstarDescription1: Ped is located inside an air defence sphere.

PRF_SuppressTakedownMeleeActions.rockstarDescription1: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)

PRF_InvertLookAroundControls.rockstarDescription1: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player, for this frame.

PRF_IgnoreCombatManager.rockstarDescription1: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers).

PRF_UseBlendedCamerasOnUpdateFpsCameraRe.rockstarDescription1: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.

PRF_ForceMeleeCounter.rockstarDescription1: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.

PRF_WasHitByVehicleMelee.rockstarDescription1: Indicates that ped was hit by vehicle melee attack.

PRF_SuppressNavmeshForEnterVehicleTask.rockstarDescription1: Dont allow ped to use navmesh when navigating in TaskEnterVehicle

PRF_IgnoreDetachSafePositionCheck.rockstarDescription1: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped

PRF_DisableEasyLadderConditions.rockstarDescription1: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.

PRF_PlayerIgnoresScenarioSpawnRestrictio.rockstarDescription1: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag

PRF_UsingDrone.rockstarDescription1: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC

PRF_ForceWantedLevelWhenKilled.rockstarDescription1: Will force the player that killed this ped to get wanted level, even if he wouldnt otherwise

PRF_UseScriptedWeaponFirePosition.rockstarDescription1: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines

PRF_EnableCollisionOnNetworkCloneWhenFix.rockstarDescription1: Enable collision on player ped network clones when physics is fixed

PRF_UseExtendedRagdollCollisionCalculato.rockstarDescription1: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions

PRF_PreventLockonToFriendlyPlayers.rockstarDescription1: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players

PRF_OnlyAbortScriptedAnimOnMovementByInp.rockstarDescription1: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input

PRF_PreventAllStealthKills.rockstarDescription1: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped

PRF_BlockFallTaskFromExplosionDamage.rockstarDescription1: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage

PRF_AllowPedRearEntry.rockstarDescription1: Mimics the behaviour like with boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats
